message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Compile the campus shootings in the United States from 2010 to 2024 (including 2024). The information to be compiled includes the date of the incident (in the format of yyyy/mm/dd), the state where it occurred, the location (school), the name of the shooter, the identity of the shooter, the age of the shooter (at the time of the incident, if you can't find the exact number, output "Not Provided"), the outcome of the shooter, and the number of deaths( The statistics should include only shootings with a death toll greater than 0, excluding the death of the shooter).

Please output the sorted data in the format of one Markdown table.
Incident Date, State, Location (School), Shooter, Identity, Age of Shooter, Outcome, Death Toll

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To compile the required information about campus shootings in the United States from 2010 to 2024, I need to find specific details for each event that meets the criteria provided. 

<search>campus shootings United States 2010-2024 death toll greater than 0</search>

Search query: campus shootings United States 2010-2024 death toll greater than 0
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_school_shootings_in_the_United_States_by_death_toll):
List of school shootings in the United States by death toll - Wikipedia Between 2000 and 2022, more than 300 school shootings occurred in the United States, although only a small fraction resulted in multiple fatalities. ... While the ...

[Doc 2](https://www.cnn.com/us/school-shootings-fast-facts-dg):
School shootings in the US: Fast facts - CNN Forty-three were on college campuses, and 32 were on K-12 school grounds. The incidents left at least 31 people dead and more than 100 other ...

[Doc 3](https://www.kff.org/mental-health/examining-school-shootings-at-the-national-and-state-level-and-mental-health-implications/):
Examining School Shootings at the National and State Level ... - KFF Since the Columbine school shooting in 1999, there have been over 420 school shootings across the United States. More than 160 of these ...

<search>details of campus shootings in the United States 2010-2024 death toll greater than 0</search>

School shootings in the US: Fast facts - CNN There were at least 83 incidents in 2024, but 2022 was one of the deadliest years, with 47 fatalities, according to CNN's analysis. That year ...

[Doc 3](https://www.bestcolleges.com/research/college-shootings-statistics/):
Shootings at Colleges: U.S. Statistics | BestColleges At least 117 people have been killed in 17 mass shootings at US colleges since the 1960s. Hundreds more have been injured or killed by guns on college campuses.

Based on these documents:

Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gunviolencearchive.org/):
Gun Violence Archive MAY 1...Report of first four months: YTD deaths DOWN 866, injuries DOWN 1,901. Mass Shootings down to pre COVID levels. Gun Violence ...
